COVID-19 Link: /c/coronavirus

Trump’s coronavirus messaging criticized by ’Republicans for the Rule of Law’

Link: /i/4325168

United States President Donald Trump’s messaging over the coronavirus pandemic came under fire by a group of people from the Republican Party who are known for their opposition to the President. The group released an ad to criticize the President’s messaging, and the ad showed Mr. Trump denying words of a pandemic while at the World Economic Forum.

Kathy

GOP Group Uses Trump's Coronavirus Lies Against Him In New Attack Ad Link: https://www.huffpost.com/entry/gop-group-donald-trump-unfit-coronavirus_n_5e71d2bcc5b6f5b7c53ad74a
